settings.name: defaultGroupByColumnName
settings.description: The Word Cloud looks for specific keywords with a specific field. For example, if you had field called "Genre", a keyword to track might be "Action". In this example, the Word Cloud would count the number of times "Action" appears. You can also use keywords to track the number of times words appear within a text, e.g. the number of times "Homer" appears in a Simpsons episode title.

settings.name: keywords
settings.description: Click to select the keywords from your selected field

settings.name: defaultSortOrderDescending
settings.description: Change the default order that items in Pie Set are displayed in.

settings.name: pies
settings.description: Select the fields to display pies.

settings.name: lines
settings.description: Select the fields to display in the line graph.

settings.name: units
settings.description: Enter the unit of measure to use in the visualization overall.

settings.name: displayNavigationChart
settings.description: Displays a navigation control to focus on a subset of the chart

settings.name: groupedBars
settings.description: Toggle between a stacked bar chart (default) or a grouped bar chart.

settings.name: hideNormalize
settings.description: Hide option to toggle between absolute or relative mode.

settings.name: bars
settings.description: Select the fields to display in the bar chart. Multiple fields will either be stacked or grouped.

settings.name: units
settings.description: Enter the unit of measure to use in the visualization overall.

settings.name: latitudeField
settings.description: Select a field to use for latitude

settings.name: longitudeField
settings.description: Select a field to use for longitude

settings.name: defaultLatitude
settings.description: Enter a number between -90 and 90

settings.name: defaultLongitude
settings.description: Enter a number between -180 and 180

settings.name: sortAlphabetically
settings.description: Toggle between sort by weight or sort alphabetically items in legend.

settings.name: colorByField
settings.description: Mapping Country color to field value. (Heatmap View would only work correctly with the dataset which contain unique countries)

settings.name: defaultSortOrderDescending
settings.description: Change the default order that items in Gallery are displayed in.

settings.name: displaySortFieldText
settings.description: Display the value for the field being sorted on in the tile.

settings.name: galleryItemConditionsForBackgroundColor
settings.displayAs: Mapping Background Color to Field Value

settings.name: galleryItemConditionsForIconWhenMissingImage
settings.description: You can assign icons corresponding with fields in your data to display in your tiles. Start by selecting a field below. Then, enter the name of the item you want to assign and icon to (e.g. if your field is "Genre", you could enter "Action"). Finally, choose an icon to match. (Note that icons need to be uploaded through your Team Settings panel.)

settings.name: pointColor
settings.description: Select a color for the continents

settings.name: defaultSortOrderDescending
settings.description: Change the default order that rows in the table are displayed in.

settings.name: columnWidths
settings.description: By default, the columns in the table are all the same width. You can assign widths corresponding with fields in your data. Start by selecting a field below. Then, enter the width as a percentage. Any columns without a specified width will be evenly spaced out.

settings.name: defaultSortOrderDescending
settings.description: Change the default order that items in Gallery are displayed in.

settings.name: fieldsNotAvailableAsSortByColumns
settings.displayAs: Exclude from 'Sort By' and 'Display Additional Text' Displays

settings.name: displaySortFieldText
settings.description: Display the value for the field being sorted on in the tile.

settings.name: galleryItemConditionsForBackgroundColor
settings.displayAs: Mapping Background Color to Field Value

settings.name: galleryItemConditionsForIconWhenMissingImage
settings.description: You can assign icons corresponding with fields in your data to display in your tiles. Start by selecting a field below. Then, enter the name of the item you want to assign and icon to (e.g. if your field is "Genre", you could enter "Action"). Finally, choose an icon to match. (Note that icons need to be uploaded through your Team Settings panel.)

settings.name: areas
settings.description: Select the fields to display in the area graph.

settings.name: units
settings.description: Enter the unit of measure to use in the visualization overall.

settings.name: displayNavigationChart
settings.description: Displays a navigation control to focus on a subset of the chart

settings.name: colorScheme
settings.description: Select the color scheme

settings.name: useLogScale
settings.description: Select this option to map colors logarithmically as opposed to linearly. Use the logarithmic scale to exaggerate the color differences between regions.

matchByOptions.name: Name
matchByOptions.example: Inner Mongolia, Inner Mongol, Nèi Měnggǔ, 内蒙古

matchByOptions.name: Name
matchByOptions.example: Anqing, Anqing Prefecture City, Ānqìng, Ānqìng Dìjíshì, 安庆市

matchByOptions.name: Name
matchByOptions.example: Kinmen County, Jīnmén Xiàn, 金門縣
